title: Clinging to stability in a shifting white-collar job market
description: Workplace advice: Hiring has softened in sectors with large concentrations of office workers, and artificial intelligence adds another layer of uncertainty.

title: Doctors alarmed youngsters using AI chatbots to seek emotional support
description: Doctors say some young people are forming emotional bonds with artificial intelligence chatbots instead of people.
content:
Doctors and mental health experts have raised serious concerns about a growing number of young people turning to artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots for emotional support.

title: AI Long-Term Impact Still Underestimated: Google DeepMind's Manish Gupta
description: With power to solve humanities' toughest challenges, including in frontiers of medicine, artificial Intelligence will push human capabilities to "unimaginable" levels, Manish Gupta, Senior Director of Google DeepMind, has said, affirming his belief that its long-term impact is "still underestimated". The comment comes at a time when global debates are playing out the sharp divide between the AI bulls, who view massive infrastructure spends as a necessary foundation

title: You don't need to code to work with AI, you need Maths
description: Mathematics has always stood quietly behind great changes, and the rise of artificial intelligence is no different. As machines learn through numbers, the people who understand these numbers will shape how this new age unfolds. The future will belong to those who can read patterns, judge outcomes, and work with the logic that guides the machines.
content:
Artificial Intelligence often looks like a futuristic technology built on complex code. But behind every AI tool—whether it predicts traffic, scans a medical image, or flags a bank transaction, there is mathematics quietly doing the heavy lifting.
